name: Crystal Caverns
description: A network of caves in the mountainside east of Emberhold, illuminated by naturally phosphorescent crystals
purpose: Source of rare elemental crystals including the Ember Crystal

entrance_room.name: Entrance Cavern
entrance_room.description: The first large chamber when entering from the path to Emberhold. The air is cool and damp, and faint blue light emanates from small crystals embedded in the walls.
entrance_room.hazard_or_guardian: Some loose rocks near the entrance can fall if disturbed

puzzle_room.name: Crystal Maze
puzzle_room.description: A confusing network of crystal formations creating a natural maze. The reflective surfaces make navigation disorienting.
puzzle_room.puzzle_or_roleplay_challenge: Finding the right path through the sharp crystal formations requires careful navigation. Crystal configurations change subtly when exposed to different light sources.

setback_room.name: Crystal Growth Chamber
setback_room.description: A large cavern where most of the crystals form naturally. The chamber glows with the light of countless crystals in various colors.
setback_room.trick_or_setback: Crystal formations can occasionally crack and fall from the ceiling, blocking the path forward temporarily.

valuables.name: Minor Elemental Crystal
valuables.why_its_here: Naturally growing in this mineral-rich chamber
valuables.description: A small crystal that glows faintly with elemental energy
valuables.where_exactly: Growing in cracks and crevices throughout the chamber

climax_room.name: Deep Caverns
climax_room.description: The deepest accessible part of the cave system. The air is noticeably warmer here, and the rock walls have a reddish tint.
climax_room.climax_conflict: The thief who stole the Ember Crystal may be encountered here if they fled to retrieve more crystals.
climax_room.hazard_or_guardian: Heat vents occasionally release bursts of hot air that can cause burns. A fire elemental guardian may be awakened by the presence of intruders.

reward_room.name: Ancient Altar Chamber
reward_room.description: A hidden chamber beyond the Deep Caverns, containing an ancient stone altar. The room radiates with heat and magical energy.
reward_room.reward_or_revelation: Evidence of who took the Ember Crystal can be found near the Ancient Altar. A fragment of the original Ember Crystal remains here.

valuables.name: Ember Crystal Fragment
valuables.why_its_here: Broken piece from the stolen Ember Crystal
valuables.description: A shard of red-orange crystal that feels warm to the touch
